dcterms:description: The Oxford Radar Robotcar dataset is a radar extension to the Oxford Robotcar dataset, providing high-resolution radar data for vehicle detection in various weather conditions.

dcterms:description: Nuscenes is a multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving, containing various sensor modalities including camera, lidar, and radar data.

dcterms:description: DEF is a dataset designed for deep multimodal sensor fusion in adverse weather conditions, focusing on radar and lidar data.

dcterms:description: The Kitti Vision Benchmark Suite provides a comprehensive set of datasets for various computer vision tasks, including object detection and segmentation.
